t_process_profile_photo::text_card_0::te: Shoot a variety of compositions when illustrating the process. Some wide shots, close-ups and medium shots. Your character does not have to be in every picture.
t_process_profile_photo::clip_card_1::go: Show the very beginning or first step of the process.

t_process_profile_photo::clip_card_7::go: If the process has an audience, show their reaction.
